Cherry.action: Leila challenges Menu Man to recite a poem, showing interest in his passion.
Cherry.assessment: Encouraging someone to share their interests demonstrates genuine curiosity and friendliness, a positive indicator of warmth.

Cherry.action: Leila responds defensively when Menu Man complains about being hit by the door.

Cherry.assessment: This nurturing behavior reflects sincerity and friendliness, reinforcing a warm disposition.
